title: Eyes Closed (Rosé cover)
lyrics: Tone  I, I know where to lay I know what to say And I, I know how to play I know this game Now if I keep my eyes closed, he looks just like you But he'll never stay, they never do Now if I keep my eyes closed, he feels just like you But you've been replaced I'm face to face With someone new With someone new Would've gave it all for you, been there for you So tell me where I went wrong Would've gave it all for you, cared for you Would've traded all for you, been there for you So tell me how to move on Would've traded all for you, been there for you Now if I keep my eyes closed, he looks just like you But he'll never stay, they never do Now if I keep my eyes closed, he feels just like you But you've been replaced I'm face to face With someone new With someone new He don't realize that I'm thinkin' about you It's nothing new Now if I keep my eyes closed, he feels just like you But he'll never stay, they never do Now if I keep my eyes closed, he feels just like you But you've been replaced I'm face to face with someone .. New﻿
